body:
@ezyang it already takes in device, right? I thought the discussion was
about avoiding the verbose `device=t.device, dtype=t.dtype` kwarg.

On Sat, Jul 14, 2018, 17:00 Edward Z. Yang <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @SsnL <https://github.com/SsnL> Wasn't our actual plan to make, e.g.,
> randn accept device, so no need for a new function?
>
> —
